Hello, Im _Stunned


These are some ideas that could improve the server and make this server better. Please comment if u agree or not 1) Put a "ranked" system Ranked is a concept that is based on knowing what level is our ability in avicus competitions. Believe it or not, many people still play for a long time a game to see that reaches reach our potential. Thanks to this, many players (me too) have been able to enjoy a game for many more years.


2) Pay famous people to play and speak well of this server

I see the servers as a "fashion", if famous people played this server the rest of the followers or the vast majority would get into this one Imagine paying a youtube of 800,000 followers, I believe that at least 100 people would get into this server (at least) which would increase the server almost 300% more
